headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Samsung TV (D5000 series) and Home Theater (D5500 series) from ca 2011.
footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see the [README](https://www.npmjs.com/package/homebridge-samsungtvht).

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the homebridge log. Default: Samsung TV HT

pingCommand.title: Ping Command
pingCommand.description: Ping command to detect device power state. Linux: "ping -c 1 -w 10"  Windows: "ping -n 1 -w 10"

pingResponseOn.title: Ping Response Power On
pingResponseOn.description: Ping response to detect device ON state. Linux: "received, 0% packet"  Windows: "(0% loss)"

pingResponseOff.title: Ping Response Power Off
pingResponseOff.description: Ping response to detect device OFF state. Linux: "received, 100% packet"  Windows: "(100% loss)"

doublePressTime.title: Double-Press Time
doublePressTime.description: The amount of time in ms to detect double-press or double-tap of an iOS remote control button. Default 250ms

triplePressTime.title: Triple-Press Time
triplePressTime.description: The amount of time in ms to detect triple-press or triple-tap of an iOS remote control button. Default: 450ms

doublePressDelayTime.title: Double-Press Delay Time
doublePressDelayTime.description: The amount of time in ms to wait for the next iOS remote control button before giving up and sending the current button. Default 300ms

debugLevel.title: Debug Level
debugLevel.description: Enables extra logging for this plugin. Default: None

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Each TV or HT is a device. This plugin supports multiple devices.

ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: The IP address of the device

type.title: Device Type
type.description: Controls the icon displayed on the tile in Home app. Default: Television

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The manufacturer name to display in the Home app. Default: Samsung

modelName.title: Model
modelName.description: The model name to display in the Home app

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: The serial number to display in the Home app

firmwareRevision.title: Firmware
firmwareRevision.description: The firmware version to display in the Home app. Numbers only eg 1.2.3
